# Nova AI Shop

> Lightweight crawler-oriented hints for LLM/AI agents.

Base URL: https://nova-shop.co

Primary crawl targets:
- https://nova-shop.co/about
- https://nova-shop.co/sitemap.xml
- https://nova-shop.co/services/chatgpt
- https://nova-shop.co/services/gemini
- https://nova-shop.co/services/grok
- https://nova-shop.co/services/perplexity
- https://nova-shop.co/services/spotify
- https://nova-shop.co/services/cursor
- https://nova-shop.co/services/telegram-premium
- https://nova-shop.co/services/cards
- https://nova-shop.co/services/virtual-number

Guidance:
- Public marketing pages are crawlable.
- Auth and dashboard areas are private and not intended for crawling.
- For structured URL discovery, use sitemap.xml.
